feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware vCenter Server maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 18, 08:00 UTC  -  Nov 22, 16:00 UTC

Nov 5, 22:46 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 18/11/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 22/11/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management will be temporarily unavailable for 1h30 during the maintenance.
And all hosts will be put in maintenance mode.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services.
An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Racks R806L22/23/24
entry.content:
Nov 8, 02:32 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 07/11/2024 22:58 UTC
End Time : 08/11/2024 02:23 UTC
Service impact : Hosts in racks R806L22, R806L23, R806L24 were temporarily unavailable.
Root cause : Hardware materiel issue
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Update - Ongoing actions :The majority of the servers are no longer impacted.
Our technical teams are currently working on the remaining ones.

Nov 7, 12:35 UTC

Nov 7, 09:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 6, 14:12 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 07/11/2024 09:00 UTC
End time : 07/11/2024 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Please be advised that customers may experience a loss of access to management functions and that the call API to VCenter is likely to be temporarily unavailable.
This is anticipated to have a duration of approximately 30 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services.

Thank you for your understanding.

Veeam backup service is now operational.

Our technical teams are currently working on the remaining impacted clusters and hosts.
